title: ZUZUAN 2 Piece Hammer Set,includes 1 Pack 8 OZ Mini Stubby Claw Hammer and 1 Pack 16 OZ Fiberglass General Purpose Claw Hammer,Soft Nonslip Handle & Heat Treated Head,Heavier for Higher Hardness
descriptions:
ZUZUAN 2 Piece Hammer Set

Get dependable striking power and precise nail pulling for every project with this versatile two-hammer combo.

What’s included:
- 8 oz Mini Stubby Claw Hammer: Compact size for tight spaces, quick fixes, and precise control.
- 16 oz Fiberglass General Purpose Claw Hammer: Everyday workhorse for framing, assembly, and general repairs.

Key features:
- High-performance heads: High carbon steel, heat treated for durability and strength. Polished finish with a rust-preventative clear coating for long-lasting corrosion resistance.
- Optimized striking and pulling: Narrow, flat face delivers controlled, maximum striking strength. Sharpened, curved claw provides maximum leverage for fast, clean nail removal.
- Comfortable, secure grip: Ergonomic rubber handles with TPR coating offer a soft, non-slip, textured surface for secure handling and reduced hand fatigue.
- Vibration-dampening fiberglass: Fiberglass core construction absorbs vibration and shock for better comfort and control during prolonged use.
- Well-balanced design: Robust, well-balanced weight distribution for easy handling, accurate strikes, and confident control across tasks.
- Convenient storage: Integrated hang hole for simple storage on hooks or pegboards.
- Reliable build: Built for consistent performance in driving and pulling nails; ideal for home repairs, DIY projects, woodworking, and jobsite tasks.

Why you’ll love it:
- Two sizes cover everything from tight-space work to general construction tasks.
- Durable materials and protective finishes withstand heavy use and harsh conditions.
- Comfortable, grippy handles and vibration absorption reduce strain and improve accuracy.

Note: Some models reference glue feed technology; this set focuses on precision striking and nail pulling with enhanced control and durability.
